releaseNotes:
- Added 'Live Search' functionality with debouncing to search automatically while typing.

- Fixed download queue recursion and added file integrity checks to prevent corrupt downloads and many more...

- Team Netra

changelog.text: Added 'Live Search' functionality with debouncing to search automatically while typing.
Fixed download queue recursion and added file integrity checks to prevent corrupt downloads.
Optimized memory usage by resizing cached images (memCache) in lists.
Improved Audio Handler to show metadata immediately while resolving URLs in the background.
Moved heavy JSON serialization to a background thread to prevent UI freeze during Sync.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
